label_prompts.control_on: User wants to turn on, activate, enable, show, or start something like handles, xray flashlight, nerve, sinus, or align implants
label_prompts.control_off: User wants to turn off, deactivate, disable, hide, or stop something like handles, xray flashlight, nerve, sinus, or align implants
label_prompts.control_value: User wants to set brightness, contrast, or implant size with specific numeric values
label_prompts.info_definition: User asks what something is, definition of something, or wants information about scene elements
label_prompts.info_location: User asks where something is located or which side something is on
label_prompts.size_request: User asks for implants but doesn't specify size dimensions
label_prompts.none: No clear intent or ambiguous request
